ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.1.4_0: “Venerable Sir, there’s a monk called Gagga who is insane. He hasn’t come.”
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.1.5_0: “Monks, there are two kinds of insane monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.1.6_0: there is the insane monk who sometimes remembers the observance-day and sometimes doesn’t, who sometimes remembers the legal procedures of the Sangha and sometimes doesn’t,
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.1.7_0: Even if he returns to the observance-day procedure, sometimes he does not; sometimes he goes to the legal procedure and sometimes he does not;
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.2.1_0: For the first one of these two, I allow you to give approval in regard to insanity.
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.3.1_0: And it is to be given like this.
ai-pli-tv-kd2:25.3.2_0: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:
